content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, we being with The Left-Handed Clue, from The Adventures Of Michael Shayne. That story aired April 16, 1945.

(30:20) Our second case comes from Sherlock Holmes. From February 18, 1946, we’ll hear The Camberwell Poisoning.

Download CaseClosed724

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information.
